Taylor Swift donates $100,000 to family of slain Kansas City Chiefs fanPop superstar Taylor Swift has donated $100,000 to the family of the woman slain in a shooting near a rally for the Kansas City Chiefs where the singer's boyfriend, tight end Travis Kelce, and his teammates were celebrating their Super Bowl victory. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 22:03:25 GMT LN2ZJ7EEBNKRLER7ULN5FVZI6Q https://www.reuters.com/world/us/taylor-swift-donates-100000-family-slain-kansas-city-chiefs-fan-2024-02-16/Steve Gorman世界美国
Eyeing China, senior US lawmaker vows to back funding for Pacific islandsThe Republican chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Foreign Affairs Committee said on Friday he supported funding for U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations as a way to counter the influence of China, and would push to include them in any supplemental security aid bill. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:45:22 GMT LZC6UGA4OZJATBVUSNCCCWXHLI https://www.reuters.com/world/eyeing-china-senior-us-lawmaker-vows-back-funding-pacific-islands-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
Interpol issues arrest warrants for gunmen in last year Kosovo attackGlobal police agency Interpol has issued international arrest warrants for ethnic Serb gunmen accused of storming a village last year in north of Kosovo and battling police in a shootout, which left four dead, Kosovo's interior minister said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:28:43 GMT 6LDPMDZIPJLYNBI7CH6R7VUMXQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/interpol-issues-arrest-warrants-gunmen-last-year-kosovo-attack-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Navalny's death shocks, but doesn't shift, divided US CongressU.S. lawmakers expressed shock and outrage at the death of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny on Friday, but the news looked unlikely to bridge deep divides over whether the United States should continue its military support for Ukraine. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:58:38 GMT VR333QUOTJJHYMCBTN3N3KY https://www.reuters.com/world/navalnys-death-shocks-doesnt-shift-divide-us-congress-2024-02-16/Patricia Zengerle, Makini Brice世界
US, Arab, European ministers meet in Munich to outline post-Gaza ideasSenior U.S., Arab and European officials met in Munich on Friday to discus progress on formulating a plan for post-war Gaza that would be linked to normalizing ties between Israel and Saudi Arabia, officials and diplomats said. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:39:28 GMT VDI5Y5JKNZPLDHLXEQPECFTAMM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-arab-european-ministers-meet-munich-outline-post-gaza-ideas-2024-02-16/Humeyra Pamuk, John Irish世界
Ukraine's Zelenskiy tells Russians a vote for Putin is a vote for a murdererUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Friday that Russians who vote for President Vladimir Putin at elections next month should realize that they are voting for a murderer. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:20:25 GMT XCSYHNXWGJP6ZDLIZEYYNC3HFE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-zelenskiy-tells-Russians-vote-putin-is-vote-killers-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
World Court says no need for additional emergency measures for PalestiniansThe International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Friday said that it does not see the need for additional emergency measures to protect Palestinians' rights following Israel's Rafah offensive. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:19:00 GMT L3SEBS57UFM23PI55XIQH5JLRA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/world-court-says-no-need-additional-emergency-measures-palestinians-2024-02-16/Reuters世界中东地区
US to impose visa restrictions on Nicaraguan officialsThe United States is taking steps to impose visa restrictions on more than 100 Nicaraguan municipal officials for their role in the government of President Daniel Ortega, the State Department said in a statement on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:14:40 GMT HEFPVAPO3NOIFIZQEXE2X2O7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/us-impose-visa-restrictions-nicaraguan-officials-2024-02-16/Reuters世界美洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy says security deal with France is ambitious, substantiveUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Friday the security deal he signed with his French counterpart Emmanuel Macron on Friday was ambitious and very substantive. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:03:57 GMT JK42RVUULZNC7BSLNH22OYS4ZE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-zelenskiy-says-security-deal-with-france-is-ambitious-substantive-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel struck Palestinian police escorting Gaza aid, says US envoyThe top U.S. diplomat involved in humanitarian assistance for Gaza said on Friday that Israeli forces earlier this month killed Palestinian police protecting a U.N. aid convoy in the enclave's embattled southern city of Rafah. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:03:24 GMT DOGGW26AXRIUVPY3LNEXZXC7YI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-struck-palestinian-police-escorting-gaza-aid-says-us-envoy-2024-02-16/Jonathan Landay世界中东地区
Egypt denies allegations of participating in any process involving displacement of Gazans into SinaiEgypt categorically denied allegations of participating in any process involving the displacement of Palestinians in the Gaza Strip into the Sinai Peninsula, the country's State Information Service (SIS) said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 19:28:19 GMT BGWX6CU5RBPFTGYPAMLRK3YL44 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/egypt-denies-allegations-participating-in-any-process-involving-displacement-gazans-2024-02-16/Reuters世界非洲
